/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, providing a ground-level view of the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. A billboard stands tall on the left side of the street, while a yellow building with a red roof adds a pop of color to the right side. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene.
